definition.name: NXcantilever_spm
definition.doc: A base class to describe the cantilever used in Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM) techniques.

group.name: cantilever_oscillator
group.doc: Generally speaking, the cantilever resembles a simple harmonic oscillator. When the cantilever tip is close to the surface of the sample, an attractive or repulsive force appears between the cantilever and the sample, deforming the cantilever. The detector (typically a photodiode) measures this deformation and, therefore, the force acting on the cantilever. In a typical AFM scan cantilever moves toward the surface of the sample until a user-defined value of force acting on the cantilever is reached. The measured force is used as an input of a PID feedback loop, and the output of this loop controls the vertical position of the cantilever.

field.name: reference_amplitude
field.doc: The reference amplitude (also called drive amplitude) of the cantilever.

field.name: reference_frequency
field.doc: The reference frequency (also called drive frequency or resonance frequency) of the cantilever.

field.name: frequency_harmonic
field.doc: The harmonic (e.g., second harmonic of the fundamental frequency) frequency of the cantilever.

group.name: phase_lock_loop
group.doc: Phase locked loop for cantilever lock-in device.

group.name: cantilever_amplitude_positioner
group.doc: Describes the cantilever frequency positioner, if it exists.

group.name: cantilever_phase_positioner
group.doc: Describes the cantilever phase positioner, if it exists.

group.name: cantilever_frequency_positioner
group.doc: Describes the cantilever frequency positioner, if it exists.

field.name: phase_shift
field.doc: The phase difference between the reference signal of cantilever and response signal.

field.name: frequency_shift
field.doc: Shift in the resonance frequency of the cantilever.

field.name: frequency_cutoff
field.doc: The cutoff frequency of the cantilever.

field.name: frequency_bandwidth
field.doc: The bandwidth of the resonance frequency.

field.name: target_amplitude
field.doc: The target amplitude of the cantilever to start the AFM/SPM experiment.

field.name: active_frequency
field.doc: The active frequency of the cantilever to start the experiment.

field.name: reference_phase
field.doc: The reference phase of the cantilever oscillator.

group.name: cantilever_config
group.doc: The configuration information of the cantilever such as calibration information, material properties, etc.

field.name: cantilever_coating
field.doc: The coating material of the cantilever.

field.name: curvature_radius_N
field.doc: The radius of curvature of the cantilever tip. The (substring) N denotes X or Y.

group.doc: The calibration information of the cantilever.

field.name: sensitivity
field.doc: A force applied to the cantilever tip will cause a change in cantilever's oscillation amplitude (in dynamic mode) or deflection of the cantilever. The sensitivity of the cantilever is calculated as the ratio of this change to the force causing it.

field.name: spring_constant
field.doc: The spring constant coefficient of the cantilever.
